subject: p15259244
Impression: AP chest compared to through, 1:17 pm: Moderately severe pulmonary edema has not worsened since earlier in the day, though moderate right and small left pleural effusions have increased. Moderate cardiomegaly has remained stable over the past several days, but has progressed substantially since and could be due to cardiomegaly and/or pericardial effusion. Dual-channel catheter, presumably for hemodialysis ends in the right atrium. No pneumothorax.
